form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form Number: A2 979 192

full_text: UNITED Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles, CA File No. A20 979 192 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Name SEX DATE OF BIRTH Street Palos Bruno Ornelas Male 10-6-14 Address 290 Princeton Ave PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip Claremont, California 91711 Mexico NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Mexican PRIORITY DATE REMARKS NONPREFERENCE: Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244 )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 (Other law Specify) As of at Los Angeles. CA (Month) (Day) (Year) PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission. (Insert symbol) (Applicable in all cases) DATE 4/15/76 is. OF RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) ACTION DD DISTRICT FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE Date Foreign State Preference Category Number Month of Issuance Signed (Visa Office, Dept. of State) Form 1-357 delivered Form 1-151 delivered Form 1-151 mailed Form G-153 delivered CC: Visa Control Office, Visa Office, Department of State, Washington, D.C. 20520 for allocation of Immigrant visa number.
